body.name: Hoteam 50 Pcs USB 2.0 Flash Drives Bulk, Portable USB Thumb Drive with 50 Black Lanyard, USB Protective Cover Flash Drives for Office School Data Storage, Black (64GB)
features: Bulk Flash Drive: you will get 50 pieces of 64GB USB 2.0 flash drives and 50 lanyards, to meet your daily storage and transfer needs for music/video/photos/files/compressed packages; Small and light body, easy to carry and use

Safe and Reliable: the USB 2.0 thumb drive adopts flash memory chip, which makes the data transmission and storage process more secure and stable, with faster speed and better compatibility; 64GB flash drives compatible with USB2.0 backward USB 1.1, no need to install additional drivers

Plug and Play: USB drives bulk do not need to install any software, just simply plug into the USB port; When the zip drive is working, the red LED will light up, quickly read data files in different formats, improve your work efficiency

Portable Flash Drives: the shell of the flash drives is designed with a hat, which can provide effective protection for your USB port, and the end of the drive has a ring for a lanyard or key ring, and a lanyard for you, which is more convenient to carry around

Widely Compatible and Plug and Play: compatible with USB 2.0/1.1/1.0, without any software, can be applied for PC, TV, speaker, computer, notebook, car audio and other USB devices; An ideal choice for companies, schools, weddings, customers, or a good choice for business gifts
body.description: Feature: Widely applied: the computer flash drives can help you identify, mark and store different content. Digital data storage, transfer and sharing for school, business, university, commercial, photographic and other uses. Lightweight and Portable: the mini flash drive has a delicate and compact appearance, with a mini size of 2.2 x 0.67 x 0.3 inches, plus a black lanyard, it is convenient for the USB thumb drive to be at your service at any time. Versatile: USB thumb drives store data for school, car music, business or daily usage. The data includes music, video, photos, movies, manuals, software, etc. Specifications: Material: plastic Color: black Size: about 2.2 x 0.67 x 0.3 inches (5.6 x 1.7 x 0.8 cm) Chip: flash memory chip Interface: USB 2.0 compatible Writing speed: 3mb/s-7mb/s Reading speed: 10mb/s-20mb/s Package include: 50 x 64GB USB flash drives Capacity standard: Flash memory producers are using decimal arithmetic: 1KB = 1000Bit, 1MB = 1000KB, 1G = 1000MB Calculated, the operating system using binary arithmetic: 1KB = 1024Bit, 1MB = 1024KB, 1GB = 1024MB So the actually capacity is 64GB=approximately 58.5GB Warm notes: Please allow slight size error due to manual measurement. The colors may exist slight difference due to different screen.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 23 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lot's of space, small and looks nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work
reviews.reviewText: Does not work. Tried to download on 5 different ones. Some things were downloaded and worked, then did not work. 'ABLAZE" brand worked great at 16 GB but were twice the price. guess you get what you pay for. will be ordering a bunch of those i guess. Should have learned not everything cheap is good. Or most things are not but had to try. will be returning these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with these flash drives.
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect flash drives for the project that I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only had one bad one. Seems like an acceptable amount. I was looking to engage these, they didn’t engrave too well for those looking to have them engraved. I can usually get a white logo but couldn’t achieve that on these after trying many different settings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy these are 100% Junk!
reviews.reviewText: I distribute photos on USB. I have had 20+ complaints on pictures not showing on drive or half of the images not loading. Also the cap is so tight its not hard to pull the actual guts of the chipset out of the body. No way for me to get refund Because they are all over the country.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Says everything is corrupted
reviews.reviewText: Tried multiple usbs and multiple computers. I tried formatting the USB drives. I tried all sorts of stuff and these are all reading as if everything is corrupted. Pretty annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We used these for our photography clients and out of the first ten sent, two flash drives were already corrupt!

reviews.reviewerName: Delivered to the right house this time
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I use a lot of these
reviews.reviewText: Horrible product, they keep loosing files
